      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lom.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

            <entry>cahi1:data_33d15ecc3647823c8945a3ee3dcfde14d803e382</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Controlling radiation emission</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Steuernstrahlung Emission</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Émission de contrôle de rayonnement</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Emissão controlando da radiação</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Emissione gestente di radiazione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ελέγχοντας εκπομπή ακτινοβολίας</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Emisión de la radiación que controla</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows how to control radiation emission by heating (left) or cooling (right) an object.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">heating</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">light</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">radiation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">infra-red radiation</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, wie man Strahlung Emission 
steuert, indem sie erhitzt (nach links) oder (recht) eine Nachricht 
abkühlt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre comment contrôler 
l'émission de rayonnement en chauffant (à gauche) ou en 
refroidissant (droit) un objet.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra como controlar a emissão
da radiação aquecendo (à esquerda) ou refrigerando (direito) um 
objeto.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra come gestire 
l'emissione di radiazione riscaldando (a sinistra) o raffreddando (di 
destra) un oggetto.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση επιδεικνύει πώς να ελέγξει την 
εκπομπή ακτινοβολίας με τη θέρμανση (αριστερά) ή την ψύξη 
(δεξιά) ενός αντικειμένου.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra cómo controlar la 
emisión de la radiación calentando (a la izquierda) o refrescando 
(derecho) un objeto.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Heizung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Licht</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Strahlung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">chauffage</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">lumière</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">rayonnement</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">rayonnement infrarouge</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">heating</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">luz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">radiação</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">radiação infravermelha</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">φως</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ακτινοβολία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>

          <keyword>
